name: example
description: Example usage of sqljson-query to generate SQL.

scripts.example-db: docker run -d --name drugs-pg --rm -p 5432:5432 --shm-size=256MB -e POSTGRES_USER=drugs -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=drugs -e POSTGRES_DB=drugs drugs-pg
scripts.gen-queries: npm run compile-qgen && npm run qgen
scripts.qgen: node query-gen/build/run.js --dbmd query-gen/dbmd.json --types-header query-gen/types-header --ts-output-dir src/generated/lib --sql-output-dir src/generated/sql
